What Cow

Instantly identify cattle breeds with AI—just snap a photo and discover over 1,000 breeds worldwide.

Download on the App Store See features Privacy policy

What Cow is your pocket cattle expert. Whether you’re a farmer, student, traveler, or just curious, simply take a photo of any cow and let AI tell you the breed, key traits, and fun facts—no farming degree required!

Why you’ll love it

AI cow breed identification

Just snap a photo and let the app do the rest—instantly identify cattle breeds with AI.

Cattle breed guide

Learn about dozens of dairy and beef breeds, including key traits and fun facts.

Unlimited Facts

Get a novel response for each image you upload - with new information & facts.

Educational tool

Great for agriculture students, kids, and curious minds eager to learn about cattle.

Simple and fast

Designed for real-world farm use—get quick, reliable results every time.

Whether you're a livestock professional, hobby farmer, or just love cows, What Cow makes breed recognition easy, fast, and informative.

How it works

  1. Capture: Open What Cow and take a photo of a cow (or pick one from your library).
  2. Identify: The app analyzes the photo and suggests the most likely breed(s).
  3. Learn: Read about the breed’s traits, history, and uses.
  4. Save & share: Add to your personal log or share your find with friends.

Screenshots

Get What Cow

FAQ

Does What Cow work offline?

Yes, you can identify common breeds offline, but for best accuracy and rare breeds, an internet connection is recommended.

Can I use photos from my library?

Absolutely! You can snap a new photo or select any cow photo from your device.

Which devices are supported?

What Cow runs on iPhone and iPad with recent iOS/iPadOS versions. Check the App Store for details.

How is my data handled?

Your privacy matters. Photos are only stored locally unless you choose to share. See our Privacy Policy for details.

Is What Cow free?

You can identify a limited number of cows for free. For unlimited identifications and extra features, upgrade to Pro.

Support

Questions or feedback? Email cloud.point88@gmail.com.
